mapper.insert: insert into artbay_member(mid, injung, irum, birth, phone, email, gender, age, pwd, zip, address, address2, mdate, m_status) values(#{mid}, #{injung}, #{irum}, #{birth}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{gender}, #{age}, #{pwd}, #{zip}, #{address}, #{address2}, now(), #{m_status})
mapper.select: select count(lot) totSize from artwork where mid like '%${_parameter}%' or artwork_name like '%${_parameter}%'
